thread.title: Chevrolet of Naperville extends deadline for sale incentives
thread.title_full: Chevrolet of Naperville extends deadline for sale incentives

author: admin
title: Chevrolet of Naperville extends deadline for sale incentives
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Chevrolet of Naperville 
NAPERVILLE, Ill., Oct. 14, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- Chevrolet of Naperville is adding time back on the clock counting down to the end of one its most attractive sales of the season. Beginning in part back in September , new vehicle shoppers examining the inventory at Chevrolet of Naperville, have been able to chose selected 2015 models to receive up to 15 percent of the manufacturer's suggested retail price as cash back. Additionally, well qualified buyers can be eligible to receive a special financing rate of zero percent APR for 72 months on many of the same vehicle options at the Naperville, IL-based dealership. The new deadline to take advantage of these savings at Chevrolet of Naperville is end of business on Nov. 2. 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151014/276867 
In cooperation with Chevrolet , Chevrolet of Naperville is placing its most popular models in a position to help them find homes with new car buyers. This includes high-volume models like the 2015 Chevy Malibu, Impala and Equinox. Each of those vehicles have the needed elements to faithfully work with commuters and families on the go. Each of these vehicles also features the 4G LTE Wi-Fi hotspot offered through a partnership with Chevrolet and OnStar. Users will be able to use the strong and stable signal almost anywhere the car or crossover SUV can travel. Studies have shown that the Wi-Fi hotspot will be more reliable than what could be provided by a single device. 
The extended Chevy sale at Chevrolet of Naperville also makes a couple of high-performance models available. The 2015 Chevy Camaro SS and 2016 Chevy SS have special incentives available. Both of these vehicles offer V-8 power and performance that places them at the head of the class. 
Anyone can view the Chevrolet of Naperville inventory by visiting the dealership's website, www.chevroletofnaperville.com . The showroom is located at 1515 West Ogden Avenue, Naperville, IL 60540. Current and future customer with questions about this sale can contact a Chevrolet of Naperville sales professional today by calling, 855-315-0245. 
Media Contact: Tom Gregg, Chevrolet of Naperville, 855-315-0245, tgregg@napervilletoyota.com 
News distributed by PR Newswire iReach: https://ireach.prnewswire.com 
SOURCE Chevrolet of Naperville
